data.eml:eml: Description of new species of Phanodermopsis (Enoplida, Phanodermatidae) with key to genera of family Phanodermatidae and pictorial key to Phanodermopsis species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zograf, Julia K., Trebukhova, Yulia A., Pavlyuk, Olga N. (2015): Description of new species of Phanodermopsis (Enoplida, Phanodermatidae) with key to genera of family Phanodermatidae and pictorial key to Phanodermopsis species. Zootaxa 4032 (3): 277-289, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4032.3.3
